sentences.sContent: Having just moved from South Africa, he was storing his polo gear in one of our units.
sentences.sContent_eng: Having just moved from South Africa, he was storing his polo gear in one of our units.
sentences.sCn: 他刚从南非般到此地， 要将他的马球工具储存在我们的一个单元里。

phrases.pCn: n. 马可波罗（意大利旅行家）

trans.tranOther: a game played between two teams of players who ride on horses and hit a small ball with long-handled wooden hammers
